|footnotes = }} '''Xiaogan''' ({{zh|c=孝感 |p=Xiàogǎn}}) is a [[prefecture-level city]] in east-central [[Hubei]] province, People's Republic of China, some {{convert|60|km}} northwest of the provincial capital of [[Wuhan]]. The city's population is about 300,000 while the prefecture has about 5 million residents. ==Subdivisions== *[[Xiaonan District]] (孝南区) *[[Yingcheng]] City (应城市) *[[Anlu]] City (安陆市) *[[Hanchuan]] City (汉川市) *[[Xiaochang County]] (孝昌县) *[[Dawu County, Hubei|Dawu County]] (大悟县) *[[Yunmeng County]] (云梦县) ==Sister cities== *{{flagicon|Belarus}} [[Brest, Belarus|Brest]], [[Belarus]] ==External links== *[http://www.xiaogan.gov.cn/ Xiaogan government site] *[http://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Xiaogan Wikivoyage: Xiaogan] {{Hubei topics}} {{Hubei}} {{coord|30|55|N|113|54|E|region:CN_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Cities in Hubei]] [[Category:Prefecture-level divisions of Hubei]] {{Hubei-geo-stub}}
